directions.step:
Thaw 1 (32-ounce) package frozen bread dough. Roll dough to 1/4-inch thickness on a lightly floured surface, and cut into 4 rounds.
Brush 1 side of each round with 1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil, and place, oiled side down, on grill rack over medium-high heat (350째 to 400째).
Grill, without grill lid, 2 to 3 minutes or until light grill marks appear on bottoms.
Brush tops with 1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil, and turn oiled side down.
Sprinkle evenly with toppings, and cook pizzas by desired recipe.
Spread pizza crusts evenly with tomato sauce; sprinkle with cheese and bacon.
Grill, covered with grill lid, over medium-high heat (350째 to 400째) about 2 minutes or until slightly crisp. Yield: 4 pizzas.
